nodes.text: Falltower was a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic holding the rank of lieutenant.

In 3 ABY, Lieutenant Falltower was present when the Rebel Alliance concealed the fleet within the chromosphere of the star, Arbran, by way of five Kerts-Bhrg generators. He accompanied Princess Leia Organa back to the Salvation base on the planet, Arbra.
Falltower was a young, male Human with dark wavy hair.
The character of Lt. Falltower was created by Marvel Comics writer, David Michelinie.
